original_title: Medicine prices in Sri Lanka to drop by 16%
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): Sri Lanka's Health Ministry said that prices of medicines will drop by 16% from the 15th of June.
Health Minister Keyeliya Rambukwella said that a gazette will be issued stating that the prices of 60 types of medicines will be reduced.
He said thereafter, the prices of other medicines are also expected to drop.
